javax.help.event
Class TextHelpModelEvent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.util.EventObject
        |
        +--javax.help.event.TextHelpModelEvent
public class TextHelpModelEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

Notifies interested parties when a change in a TextHelpModel occurs. The listener should query the source for details.

See Also:
